page.title: 03HOME LIFE. A FATHER'S DAY
page.content: Gets up at 7.15am,washes,has breakfast usually cereal,an egg and toast.Cleans his teeth.Drives to { {Hartbury Agricultural College}near{ {Gloucester}where he teaches. On arrival in his office he opens his mail and writes replies.He teaches {Agricultural}students about farming.This will take place in a classroom,on the college farms or in the workshop with the{tractors}and {machinery.}He shows them the different sorts of crops and grass and how they are grown.The students are shown how to use{fertilisers}and{sprays.}After lunch he might visit some farms or have a meeting. My father looks after all the part-time courses held at the{college} and at centres in{Cirencester}and{ {North Avon.}He has about ten other teachers and assistants to help him.
